  <script>
   ChangeUrls();

  function ChangeUrls()
  {
    var newUrl='';
    var strUrl = String(window.location).toLowerCase();
    if(strUrl.indexOf('/blog/?category=gear')&gt;=0)
    {
    	history.pushState(null, "", "/gear");
    }
    if(strUrl.indexOf('/blog/?category=guns')&gt;=0)
    {
    	history.pushState(null, "", "/guns");
    }
    if(strUrl.indexOf('/blog/?category=style')&gt;=0)
    {
    	history.pushState(null, "", "/style");
    }
    if(strUrl.indexOf('/blog/?category=tech')&gt;=0)
    {
    	history.pushState(null, "", "/tech");
    }
    if(strUrl.indexOf('/blog/?category=man%20rigs')&gt;=0)
    {
    	history.pushState(null, "", "/manrigs");
    }
    if(strUrl.indexOf('/blog/?category=books')&gt;=0)
    {
    	history.pushState(null, "", "/manbooks");
    }
  	
  }
  </script>
  <script>
   $( document ).ready(function() {
   $( "article .sqs-comment-link" ).each(function( index ) {
  $(this).text('Comment');
});
});
  </script>

       <article class="hentry category-man-rigs author-the-mans-man post-type-text" id="post-51752e03e4b06960b9c20820">
        <!--POST TILE-->
        <h1 class="title">
         <a href="/blog/2012/12/19/1963-nissan-patrol-4x4">
          1963 Nissan Patrol 4x4
         </a>
        </h1>
        <!--MAIN CONTENT-->
        <div class="sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12" data-layout-label="Post Body" data-type="item" id="item-51752e03e4b06960b9c20820">
         <div class="row sqs-row">
          <div class="col sqs-col-12 span-12">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="row sqs-row">
          <div class="col sqs-col-12 span-12">
           <div class="sqs-block image-block sqs-block-image" data-block-type="5" id="block-2b0993ada56b74f70e46">
            <div class="sqs-block-content">
             <div class="image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below ">
              <div class="intrinsic" style="max-width:580.0px;">
               <a href="http://bringatrailer.com/2012/12/17/bat-exclusive-well-sorted-1963-nissan-patrol-4x4/" target="_blank">
                <div class="image-block-wrapper " data-description="&lt;p&gt;Only 4000 of these were imported into the US and of those only 700 were soft tops. &nbsp;Click on the pic to go to Bring A Trailer.&lt;/p&gt;" style="padding-bottom:64.31034088134766%;">
                 <noscript>
                  <img alt="Only 4000 of these were imported into the US and of those only 700 were soft tops. Click on the pic to go to Bring A Trailer." src="http://static1.squarespace.com/static/5159cc22e4b0ffd38a3c8ba3/t/51752e2be4b0f7b91d670ca2/1366634028992/63+patrol.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                 <img alt="Only 4000 of these were imported into the US and of those only 700 were soft tops. Click on the pic to go to Bring A Trailer." class="thumb-image" data-image="http://static1.squarespace.com/static/5159cc22e4b0ffd38a3c8ba3/t/51752e2be4b0f7b91d670ca2/1366634028992/63+patrol.jpg" data-image-dimensions="580x373" data-image-focal-point="0.5,0.5" data-image-id="51752e2be4b0f7b91d670ca2" data-load="false" data-src="http://static1.squarespace.com/static/5159cc22e4b0ffd38a3c8ba3/t/51752e2be4b0f7b91d670ca2/1366634028992/63+patrol.jpg" data-type="image"/>
                </div>
               </a>
               <div class="image-caption-wrapper">
                <div class="image-caption">
                 <p>
                  Only 4000 of these were imported into the US and of those only 700 were soft tops. Click on the pic to go to Bring A Trailer.
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

                  <a class="summary-thumbnail-container sqs-gallery-image-container" data-description="" data-title="How to Build Cabins, Lodges, &amp; Bungalows" href="/blog/2013/10/15/how-to-build-cabins-lodges-bungalows">

                     <time class="summary-metadata-item summary-metadata-item--date" datetime="2013-10-15">

                  <a class="summary-thumbnail-container sqs-gallery-image-container" data-description="" data-title="Smoke: New Firewood Cooking" href="/blog/2013/5/6/smoke-new-firewood-cooking">
                   <div class="summary-thumbnail img-wrapper">
                    <!-- First Image in Post -->
                    <img class="summary-thumbnail-image" data-image-dimensions="1000x750" data-load="false" data-src="http://static1.squarespace.com/static/5159cc22e4b0ffd38a3c8ba3/t/5187e368e4b0c64b310562b3/1367860075483/Smoke.jpg"/>
                   </div>

         <div class="sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12" data-type="block-field" data-updated-on="1435259945484" id="Gear">
          <div class="row sqs-row">
           <div class="col sqs-col-12 span-12">
            <div class="sqs-block summary-v2-block sqs-block-summary-v2" data-block-json='{"collectionId":"515afa01e4b0496e932b84f9","design":"carousel","headerText":"","textSize":"medium","pageSize":30,"imageAspectRatio":"1.5","columnWidth":270,"gutter":60,"listImageSize":30,"listImageAlignment":"left","slidesPerRow":3,"textAlignment":"left","showTitle":true,"showThumbnail":true,"showExcerpt":true,"showReadMoreLink":false,"showPrice":true,"productQuickViewEnabled":false,"showPastOrUpcomingEvents":"Upcoming","metadataPosition":"below-content","primaryMetadata":"cats","secondaryMetadata":"none","filter":{"category":"Gear"},"autoCrop":true,"lightbox":false,"mixedContent":true,"blockId":"ec2cad49ac57070e0b6e","hSize":null,"floatDir":null}' data-block-type="55" id="block-yui_3_17_2_2_1435259853482_7012">
             <div class="sqs-block-content">
              <div class=" summary-block-wrapper summary-block-collection-type-blog summary-block-setting-text-size-medium summary-block-setting-text-align-left summary-block-setting-design-carousel summary-block-setting-design-list-thumbnail-left summary-block-setting-metadata-position-below-content summary-block-setting-primary-metadata-cats summary-block-setting-secondary-metadata-none summary-block-setting-show-thumbnail summary-block-setting-show-title summary-block-setting-show-price summary-block-setting-show-excerpt sqs-gallery-design-carousel sqs-gallery-design-carousel-slides-in-view-3 ">

                  <a class="summary-thumbnail-container sqs-gallery-image-container" data-description="" data-title="Mountain America Gourmet Jerky" href="/blog/mountain-america-gourmet-jerky">

                     <span class="summary-metadata-item summary-metadata-item--comments">

                      </a>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <!-- Title -->

                  <a class="summary-thumbnail-container sqs-gallery-image-container" data-description="" data-title="James The Chapter Titanium + Stainless Pocket Knife" href="/blog/james-the-chapter-titanium-stainless-pocket-knife">

                    <!-- First Image in Post -->
                    <img class="summary-thumbnail-image" data-image-dimensions="1198x551" data-load="false" data-src="http://static1.squarespace.com/static/5159cc22e4b0ffd38a3c8ba3/t/54dba97ce4b04f6a89705c8b/1423682460281/"/>

            <div class="sqs-block summary-v2-block sqs-block-summary-v2" data-block-json='{"collectionId":"515afa01e4b0496e932b84f9","design":"carousel","headerText":"","textSize":"medium","pageSize":30,"imageAspectRatio":"1.5","columnWidth":270,"gutter":60,"listImageSize":30,"listImageAlignment":"left","slidesPerRow":3,"textAlignment":"left","showTitle":true,"showThumbnail":true,"showExcerpt":true,"showReadMoreLink":false,"showPrice":true,"productQuickViewEnabled":false,"showPastOrUpcomingEvents":"Upcoming","metadataPosition":"below-content","primaryMetadata":"cats","secondaryMetadata":"none","filter":{"category":"Guns"},"autoCrop":true,"lightbox":false,"mixedContent":true,"blockId":"dc1addde45f13098848e","hSize":null,"floatDir":null}' data-block-type="55" id="block-yui_3_17_2_2_1435259853482_84903">

            <div class="sqs-block summary-v2-block sqs-block-summary-v2" data-block-json='{"collectionId":"515afa01e4b0496e932b84f9","design":"carousel","headerText":"","textSize":"medium","pageSize":30,"imageAspectRatio":"1.5","columnWidth":270,"gutter":60,"listImageSize":30,"listImageAlignment":"left","slidesPerRow":3,"textAlignment":"left","showTitle":true,"showThumbnail":true,"showExcerpt":true,"showReadMoreLink":false,"showPrice":true,"productQuickViewEnabled":false,"showPastOrUpcomingEvents":"Upcoming","metadataPosition":"below-content","primaryMetadata":"cats","secondaryMetadata":"none","filter":{"category":"Style"},"autoCrop":true,"lightbox":false,"mixedContent":true,"blockId":"1b21c5f0b496d2e8415e","hSize":null,"floatDir":null}' data-block-type="55" id="block-yui_3_17_2_2_1435260634141_30973">

                    <div class="summary-metadata summary-metadata--secondary">
                     <!-- Timestamp -->
                     <time class="summary-metadata-item summary-metadata-item--date" datetime="2013-04-11">
                      Apr 11, 2013

                     <!-- Comments -->
                     <span class="summary-metadata-item summary-metadata-item--comments">
                      <a href="/blog/2013/3/21/emil-erwin-briefcase#comments-516c353be4b012d5774769ec">
                       Comment
                      </a>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <!-- End .summary-content -->
                 </div>
                 <!-- End .summary-item -->
                </div>
                <!-- End .summary-item-list -->
               </div>
               <!-- End .summary-item-list-container -->
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12" data-type="block-field" data-updated-on="1435260776563" id="Tech">
          <div class="row sqs-row">
           <div class="col sqs-col-12 span-12">
            <div class="sqs-block summary-v2-block sqs-block-summary-v2" data-block-json='{"collectionId":"515afa01e4b0496e932b84f9","design":"carousel","headerText":"","textSize":"medium","pageSize":30,"imageAspectRatio":"1.5","columnWidth":270,"gutter":60,"listImageSize":30,"listImageAlignment":"left","slidesPerRow":3,"textAlignment":"left","showTitle":true,"showThumbnail":true,"showExcerpt":true,"showReadMoreLink":false,"showPrice":true,"productQuickViewEnabled":false,"showPastOrUpcomingEvents":"Upcoming","metadataPosition":"below-content","primaryMetadata":"cats","secondaryMetadata":"none","filter":{"category":"Tech"},"autoCrop":true,"lightbox":false,"mixedContent":true,"blockId":"15e11ab78aa7451b39bf","hSize":null,"floatDir":null}' data-block-type="55" id="block-yui_3_17_2_2_1435260634141_57763">
             <div class="sqs-block-content">
              <div class=" summary-block-wrapper summary-block-collection-type-blog summary-block-setting-text-size-medium summary-block-setting-text-align-left summary-block-setting-design-carousel summary-block-setting-design-list-thumbnail-left summary-block-setting-metadata-position-below-content summary-block-setting-primary-metadata-cats summary-block-setting-secondary-metadata-none summary-block-setting-show-thumbnail summary-block-setting-show-title summary-block-setting-show-price summary-block-setting-show-excerpt sqs-gallery-design-carousel sqs-gallery-design-carousel-slides-in-view-3 ">

    <div class="sqs-layout sqs-grid-1 columns-1" data-type="block-field" data-updated-on="1389212816165" id="Master_BuyButtonCode">
     <div class="row sqs-row">
      <div class="col sqs-col-1 span-1">
       <div class="sqs-block code-block sqs-block-code" data-block-type="23" id="block-ff66949a0748c6335cad">
        <div class="sqs-block-content">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          $(document).ready(function () {
        InsertBuyButton();
        SetSelectedTopNav();

    });

    function InsertBuyButton() {

        //Add 'featured' class to image if post is featured. this will be used while changing the text of button
        $('article').each(function () {

            if ($(this).hasClass("featured") == true) {
                $(this).find('div.image-caption-wrapper').addClass('featured');
            }
            
        });

        $('.image-block-wrapper').each(function () {
            var BuyLink = $(this).parent().attr('href');
            if (BuyLink != undefined) {
                var ButtonClass = '';
                
                if ($(this).parent().parent().parent().find('div.image-caption-wrapper').hasClass("featured") == true) {
                    ButtonClass = "linkbutton";
                }
                else {
                    ButtonClass = "buybutton";
                }

                $(this).parent().removeAttr('href');
                $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('.image-caption-wrapper').append('&lt;a href="' + BuyLink + '" class="' + ButtonClass + '" target="_blank"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;');
            }
        });
    }

    function SetSelectedTopNav() {

        var PageName = getParameterByName('category');

        $('#main-navigation ul li a').each(function () {
            if (PageName != null) {
                PageName = PageName.replace('%20', ' ')
                var NavName = $.trim($(this).text().toLowerCase());

                if (NavName == PageName.toLowerCase()) {
                    $(this).parent().addClass('active-link');
                    $('#main-navigation ul li:first').removeClass('active-link');
                }
            }
        });
    }

    function getParameterByName(name) {
        var match = RegExp('[?&amp;]' + name + '=([^&amp;]*)').exec(window.location.search);
        return match &amp;&amp; decodeURIComponent(match[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
    }
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
  </div>
  <!--FOOTER WITH OPEN BLOCK FIELD-->

  <!--INJECTION POINT FOR TRACKING SCRIPTS AND USER CONTENT FROM THE CODE INJECTION TAB-->
  <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
          
            function moveFloatMenu() {

                var menuOffset = 0;
                if ($(this).scrollTop() &gt; 170) {
                    menuOffset = $(this).scrollTop() - 185 + "px";
                    $('.logo').hide();
                    $('#main-navigation').addClass('floating');
                    $('.content_container').addClass('margin-floating');
                }
                else {
                    menuOffset = "0px";
                    $('.logo').show();
                    $('#main-navigation').removeClass('floating');
                    $('.content_container').removeClass('margin-floating');
                }

                $('#adsFloatingWindow').animate({ top: menuOffset }, { duration: 700, queue: false });
            }
            if ($(window).width() &gt; 1024) {
                $(window).scroll(moveFloatMenu);
                moveFloatMenu();
            }
          
          //for Making Images normal width and Caption Ful Width
          SetCaptionWidthToFull();
        });
      function SetCaptionWidthToFull()
      {
        var HTMLCaption='';
        
        $( "div.image-block-outer-wrapper" ).each(function( index ) {
          if($(this).find('div.image-caption-wrapper').html()!=null)
          {
            HTMLCaption='&lt;div class="image-caption-wrapper"&gt;'
            HTMLCaption=HTMLCaption + $(this).find('div.image-caption-wrapper').html();
            $(this).find('div.image-caption-wrapper').remove()
            HTMLCaption=HTMLCaption+ '&lt;/div&gt;';
              $(this).append(HTMLCaption); 
          }
		});
      }
  </script>
  <script data-sqs-type="imageloader-bootstraper" type="text/javascript">
   (function() {if(window.ImageLoader) { window.ImageLoader.bootstrap(); }})();
  </script>
  <script>
   Squarespace.afterBodyLoad(Y);
  </script>
